mapper.insert: insert into daily_excercise (weightNow, startTime, endTime, countNow, equipmentName, excerciseDay, rfidKey) values (#{weightNow}, NOW(), NOW(),1, #{equipmentName}, #{excerciseDay}, #{rfidKey})
mapper.update: UPDATE fitness_equipment SET isStarted = IF(isStarted=0,1,0) WHERE equipmentName = #{equipmentName};
mapper.select: SELECT equipmentName, isStarted FROM fitness_equipment WHERE equipmentName = #{equipmentName};
SELECT weightNow, equipmentName, rfidKey FROM daily_excercise where rfidKey = #{rfidKey} ORDER BY updateRegist desc LIMIT 1;
